name.baseName: Concrete production ; High-performance marine concrete (C40) ; Total of all wind farm
混凝土生产 ; 高性能海工混凝土( C40 ) ; 整个风电场

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: This data set pertains to the production of High-performance marine concrete (C40), specifically utilized in the construction of offshore wind farms, such as the Donghai Bridge Offshore Wind Farm (DBOWF) in China. This type of concrete is known for its durability and strength in marine environments and is typically used for building wind turbine foundations owing to its resistance to harsh weather conditions and sea water.
该数据集涉及高性能海工混凝土(C40)的生产，特别用于建设海上风电场，例如中国的东海大桥海上风电场(DBOWF)。这种混凝土因其在海洋环境中的耐用性和强度而闻名，通常用于建造风力涡轮机基础，因为它能够抵御恶劣的天气条件和海水。

quantitativeReference.functionalUnitOrOther: The functional unit is 1 kWh on-grid electricity provision.

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: The studied wind farm, the Donghai Bridge Offshore Wind Farm (DBOWF), is China's first offshore wind farm within the jurisdiction of Shanghai, as well as the first offshore wind farm outside Europe. The project has two-phases of construction, located on each side of the Donghai bridge (Fig. 1).
所研究的风电场- -东海大桥海上风电场( DBOWF )是中国在上海管辖范围内的第一个海上风电场，也是欧洲以外的第一个海上风电场。工程分两期施工，分别位于东海大桥两侧(图1 )。

technology.technologicalApplicability: This data set pertains to the production of High-performance marine concrete (C40), specifically utilized in the construction of offshore wind farms, such as the Donghai Bridge Offshore Wind Farm (DBOWF) in China. This type of concrete is known for its durability and strength in marine environments and is typically used for building wind turbine foundations owing to its resistance to harsh weather conditions and sea water.
该数据集涉及高性能海工混凝土(C40)的生产，特别用于建设海上风电场，例如中国的东海大桥海上风电场(DBOWF)。这种混凝土因其在海洋环境中的耐用性和强度而闻名，通常用于建造风力涡轮机基础，因为它能够抵御恶劣的天气条件和海水。

LCIMethodAndAllocation.deviationsFromLCIMethodApproaches: The present study employed the PLCA modeling approach to calculate the energy and environmental emissions of a typical offshore wind farm in China. The cradle-to-grave process includes four stages, materials and equipment manufacturing, transportation and installation, operation and maintenance, and dismantling and recycling (Fig. 2).
本研究采用PLCA建模方法计算了中国某典型海上风电场的能源和环境排放。从摇篮到坟墓的过程包括材料和设备制造、运输和安装、操作和维护、拆解和回收4个阶段(图2 )。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: The technical parameters of wind turbines, foundations and cables are obtained from the design documents of the DBOWF (Table 2). For key materials and equipment, their sea transportation energy is calculated from the transportation load and shipping energy intensity. The facility installation energy and emissions were estimated based on the construction plan. The wind farm's operation and maintenance data, such as the frequency and working time of maintenance, were obtained from site investigations with engineers and technicians. The uncertainties associated with model parameters and input data are illustrated in the sensitivity analysis section of this paper.
风机、基础和电缆的技术参数从DBOWF的设计文件中获得(表2)。对于关键材料和设备，其海上运输能量由运输负荷和海运能量强度计算得到。根据施工方案，对设施安装能耗和排放进行了估算。风电场的运行和维护数据，如维护的频率和工作时间，是通过与工程技术人员的现场调查获得的。与模型参数和输入数据相关的不确定性在本文的敏感性分析部分进行了说明。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Yang, J. et al. The life-cycle energy and environmental emissions of a typical offshore wind farm in China. Journal of Cleaner Production 180, 316–324 (2018).
Yang, J. et al. The life-cycle energy and environmental emissions of a typical offshore wind farm in China. Journal of Cleaner Production 180, 316–324 (2018).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When using this data set for Life Cycle Assessment, users should model the use phase behavior closely with regard to durability and maintenance frequency as provided by on-site investigations of engineers and technicians. Users should also carefully account for the transportation energy of materials and equipment based on transportation load and shipping intensity, and include considerations for energy and emissions during facility installation, as per the construction plan. The sensitivity analysis section should be referred to in order to understand uncertainties related to model parameters and input data. This LCA data is intended to assist in the evaluation of energy and environmental emissions across all life cycle stages from cradle to grave, which includes manufacturing, transportation and installation, operation and maintenance, and dismantling and recycling of the offshore wind farm infrastructure, for the functional unit of 1 kWh on-grid electricity provision.

在使用该数据集进行生命周期评估时，用户应根据工程师和技术人员的现场调查密切模拟使用阶段的行为，特别注意耐久性和维护频率。用户还应根据运输负荷和海运能量强度仔细计算材料和设备的运输能量，并根据施工计划包括设施安装期间的能量和排放考虑。敏感性分析部分应被查阅，以了解与模型参数和输入数据相关的不确定性。该LCA数据旨在协助评估从摇篮到坟墓的全部生命周期阶段的能源和环境排放，包括海上风电场基础设施的制造、运输和安装、操作和维护，以及拆解和回收，功能单元为1 kWh的电网供电。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
